text: @TerryMoran This is more than a good look for a President of the United States. It is a look of someone who is a leader, both confident and secure. Someone who understands the enormous impact COVID-19 has on the world. Someone who is ready to lead and be there for us. 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸#Biden2020

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
